moves.1. e4 e5 2. f4: Kings' Gambit: I am starting to like it...
moves.2... Nc6 3. Nf3 d6 4. Bb5: take out Nc6: it might give trouble at d4...
moves.4... Bg4: pinning Nf3 is no problem for White...
moves.5. O-O Be7 6. d3: covering f4: we look after the little ones...
moves.7... Bd7 8. c4: a bit of a waiting move: d5 is no option for Black...
moves.8... a6 9. Bxc6 Bxc6 10. b4 b5 11. Nc3 b: winning a pawn, but the pleasure is short lived...
moves.17. Bb2: e5 is the target: no rocket science involved here...
moves.17... Rb6: losing control: but there was no saving this...
moves.19... Qa8: not sure, what happens here: Black cracks...
